description:
Navid Shelkol
----------------------
Production Engineer at Facebook
----------------------
How does Facebook manage one of the largest infrastructures on the planet? Using Python we have built a framework to develop scalable workflows that engineers at Facebook use to automate our infrastructure’s lifecycle so that you can keep sharing and connecting with your friends and family.
----------------------
Social Networks:
https://www.facebook.com/shnavid
https://www.linkedin.com/in/shnavid/

--------------------------------------------

About PyCon Colombia 2018
--------------------------------------------------

We are excited to share this overview of the second edition of Colombia’s Python Conference: PyCon Colombia 2018 - http://bit.ly/overview-pyconcolombia2018

We want to say thanks to all our sponsors who helped make the conference a huge success.


- The Python Software Foundation -
- EAFIT University - http://www.eafit.edu.co/
- HDE - https://www.hde.co.jp/en/

Join us at our next conference, February 8 - 10, 2019 in Bogota, Colombia. More information in http://www.pycon.co
title: Navid Shelkhol - FBJE is a framework used at Facebook for developing workflows in Python
